name: adc_gtm_server_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()


def getGTMServerList():
    '''
    to get the list of GTM server

    '''

    gtm_server_list = []
    adc_gtm_server_list = connect_db.appviewx.gs.find()
    for device in adc_gtm_server_list:
        gtm_server_list.append(device)
    return gtm_server_list
description: To get a list of GTM server
_keywords: To get a list of GTM server
